wikipedia_page.main: Peter Gwynne Morgan is a television and film writer/producer. A winner of the 2009 Emmy Award for Outstanding Writing for Nonfiction Programming for his work on Roman Polanski: Wanted and Desired, he is married to American documentary director Marina Zenovich.

response: * P. G. Morgan, British TV producer and writer
